Name: Voronoi Panel Generator
Description: Creates a Voronoi pattern on a surface.Creates a Voronoi pattern on a surface.

Name: Parametric Tower Designer
Description: Generates a parametric tower based on user-defined curves.

Name: Weave Surface Creator
Description: Creates a woven surface from two sets of curves.

Name: Contour Generator
Description: Generates contours from a mesh or surface at specified intervals.

Name: Surface Subdivision Tool
Description: Subdivides a surface into smaller panels using various methods.

Name: Attractor Point Modifier
Description: Modifies geometry based on distance to attractor points.

Name: Curve Network Generator
Description: Creates a network of curves based on proximity.

Name: Paneling Tool with Rotation
Description: Creates a paneling system with rotational variation.

Name: Grid Morph
Description: Morphs a grid onto a target surface.

Name: Star Pattern Creator
Description: Generates star-shaped patterns.

Name: Random Box Generator
Description: Generates boxes with random sizes and rotations.

Name: Sphere Packing Algorithm
Description: Packs spheres within a defined volume.

Name: Minimal Surface Finder
Description: Approximates a minimal surface between boundary curves.

Name: Branching Structure Generator
Description: Creates branching structures from a seed curve.

Name: Dome Generator
Description: Generates geodesic domes of varying frequency.

Name: Tensegrity Structure Creator
Description: Generates tensegrity structures.

Name: Cellular Automata Surface
Description: Applies cellular automata rules to a surface.

Name: Loft by Section Curves
Description: Creates a lofted surface from a series of section curves.

Name: Twisted Box Morph
Description: Morphs boxes onto a twisted surface.

Name: Fractal Tree Generator
Description: Generates fractal tree structures.
